p: The networks found by the PC-algorithm are then post-processed off-line to determine and aggregate the final expansion gene lists. List aggregation is done with the ranking aggregation method Markov Chain 4 (MC4) ( Dwork et al., 2001), since it has been shown to yield the most precise results ( Asnicar et al., 2016). For the MC4 ranking aggregation we decided to consider the first 1,000 genes of each expansion output list ( K = 1,000).
